long_description: Built to withstand the worst weather, the Black Diamond Storm Headlamp offers a 100 lumen beam and tough, waterproof construction. Headlamp features a TriplePower LED that outputs up to 100 lumens and throws a beam up to 70m so you can locate the hiking trail at night. 2 SinglePower white LEDs and 2 SinglePower red LEDs output 25 lumens and throw a beam up to 20m. Use the red LEDs to preserve night vision while hanging out at camp or making your way down the trail. Dimmer switch lets you choose the light output needed for the task at hand, from a blazing 100 lumens down to 25 lumens. Use the 2 strobe functions to flash red or white light. Sleek headlamp operates on 4 AAA batteries, included. 4 AAA batteries provide up to 50 hrs. of use on high and 200 hrs. on low; battery indicator light helps you determine how much battery power you have left. The Black Diamond Storm headlamp has an IPX7 waterproof rating (protected against water immersion down to 1m for 30 min.). Closeout.
short_description: Built to withstand the worst weather, the Black Diamond Storm Headlamp offers a 100 lumen beam and tough, waterproof construction.
